vlive.korean: 보이시는지 모르겠지만 이 정도 됐습니다 반죽처럼 형성이 됐거든요? Can you see? It is like dough. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [V PICK! HOW TO in V] 박지훈의 강아지간식🐶🍪 (HOW TO COOK PARK JI HOON’s Dog snack)
vlive.english: Can you see? It is like dough.

vlive.korean: [투명한 수분막이 하나 얇게 형성된 느낌] 뭔가 투명한 보습막이 하나 형성되는 느낌? Feels like a clear moisture of layer is forming. 듣기 View video HANABONO : 면세쇼핑에도 기술이 필요해! 면세쇼핑꿀팁,여름휴가아이템
vlive.english: Feels like a clear moisture of layer is forming.

vlive.korean: 가치관은 어떻게 형성이 된 겁니까? Why is it? 듣기 View video JTBC4 : 어썸피드 이승훈이 직접 패션상담해dream (feat. 스페셜 게스트)
형성평가겠지? It's probably formative evaluation, right? 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 놀러오세용
아밀라제가 많이 형성이 돼서 여러분들... Lots of amylase, everyone. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : Jang Dong Woo X Rooftop Live - 장동우의 루프탑라이브!

examples.korean: friendships formed while she was at college 발음듣기 그녀가 대학 다닐 때 형성된 교우 관계 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: friendships formed while she was at college 발음

examples.korean: The cave has been hollowed out of the mountainside. 발음듣기 그 동굴은 산허리가 패여 형성된 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The cave has been hollowed out of the mountainside. 발음

examples.korean: carbon atoms strung together to form giant molecules 발음듣기 함께 길게 이어져 거대한 분자를 형성하는 탄소 원자 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: A bond of friendship had been forged between them. 발음듣기 그들 사이에는 우정 어린 유대가 형성되어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A bond of friendship had been forged between them. 발음

examples.korean: Adult behaviour is often patterned by childhood experiences. 발음듣기 성인의 행동은 흔히 어릴 적의 경험들에 의해 양식이 형성된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Adult behaviour is often patterned by childhood experiences. 발음
